pageTitle: Re: Why not the 300 or 60-250?: Pentax SLR Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {6005=Why not the DA300 f4? Not WR but a really nice 300 and they go for about 1200 Also the 60-250 is a very good lense... at 1200 If you want a zoom}
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   -JF http://www.flickr.com/photos/jftouchette/ -JF The DA*60-250 would be too heavy and too short for my purposes. The DA*300 is WR, as written in the next reply. In a canoe, indeed, the superzoom is a more convenient sized camera. And, it's less expensive in case of mishap in a canoe. Hi, Britney (?), "It is not necessary to understand things in order to argue about them." ~~ Pierre Beaumarchais~~ - As far as a canoe goes... I would use a -- hide signature --
